description: Decimal expansion of 6^n contains no zeros (probably finite).
links: W. Schneider, NoZeros: Powers n^k without Digit Zero [Cached copy]
prog: (PARI) for(n=0, 199, vecmin(digits(6^n))&& print1(n", ")) \\ M. F. Hasler, Mar 07 2014(MAGMA) [n: n in [0..500] | not 0 in Intseq(6^n)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 08 2014
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Offset corrected and initial 0 added by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014
